data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
It's been more than a half a year now since I first requested the
    namespace and I would really like a final judgment from perl.modules
    on this matter.

    Also, you can now add to section 3.1 (IETF - Internet Engineering
    Task Force (RFCs)):

    RFC1436 Internet Gopher Protocol Net::Gopher
